overall_summary: Schools in Nuh district of Haryana closed today: Here's why 'Govt plotted jailbreak' Jitendra Singh slams Farooq Punjab jailbreak: 1 killed. FASTag users alert! You may risk blacklisting over this common mistake.

individual_summaries.headline: FASTag users alert! You may risk blacklisting over this common mistake
individual_summaries.summary: The National Highways Authority of India has tightened its policy against the misuse of FASTags. The new directive instructs toll collecting agencies and concessionaires to immediately report instances where Fastags are not affixed to a vehicle’s windscreen.

individual_summaries.headline: Schools in Nuh district of Haryana closed today: Here's why
individual_summaries.summary: All educational institutions in Haryana's Nuh district ordered shut on Monday. The order comes alongside a 24-hour suspension of mobile internet and bulk SMS services. The move is aimed at averting a repeat of last year’s communal violence.

individual_summaries.headline: 'Govt plotted jailbreak'
individual_summaries.summary: Punjab govt plotted Nabha jailbreak, alleges Amarinder Singh. Election Result CoverageLebanon Rocket AttackKim JongAR RahmanHezbollah Weapon.

individual_summaries.headline: Jitendra Singh slams Farooq
individual_summaries.summary: Jitendra Singh slams Farooq Abdullah over his controversial remarks on PoKTrendingElection Result CoverageLebanon Rocket AttackKim JongAR RahmanHezbollah Weapon.

individual_summaries.headline: Punjab jailbreak: 1 killed
individual_summaries.summary: A 24-year old woman, Reena, was killed in Samrala, Punjab, when police opened fire at a vehicle which jumped a security barricade. Police in the state are on high alert after six inmates of Nabha jail - including dreaded Khalistan Liberation Force chief Harminder Mintoo.
